masterheader: YOU ARE ON THE RIGHT PLACE FOR ORDERING DISPOSABLE CONSUMABLES AND CUTLERY
aboutcaption:
In our site you will find 100% biodegradable and environmentally friendly products.

You can order wholesale and retail quantities as well as request branding of the products.

The delivery time depends on the requested and available quantities.

Quantities in stock are delivered by courier to the next working day.
contactuscaption:
Are you ready to buy an eco product?
Contact us and request your order.
Send us a text or logo if you wish to brand the products.
Our associate will contact you within the day to confirm the order.
